Package model

Class Accounts

java.lang.Object
model.Accounts
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Accounts extends Object implements Serializable
The Accounts class allows for initialization of a user, with username, password, and MemoryGame related statistics.
Author:
Kyle Myint, Louis Romeo, Seth Jernigan, Mustafa Alnidawi
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Accounts(String username, String password)
    The constructor for accounts, which sets all best scores to -1 by default, gamesPlayed to 0, and sets username and password.

    • Accounts

      public Accounts(String username, String password)
      The constructor for accounts, which sets all best scores to -1 by default, gamesPlayed to 0, and sets username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The Account's username.
      password - The Accounts password.

  • Method Details

    • setNewBestScore

      public void setNewBestScore(int newScore, int gameMode)
      Given a newScore and game mode, this method sets a new best score for the account.
      Parameters:
      newScore - The value of the newest score.
      gameMode - The specified game mode to update best score of.
